Name: Arena
Text: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature you control and target creature of an opponent's choice they control. Those creatures fight each other. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

Name: Mana Crypt
Text: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you.\n{T}: Add {C}{C}.

Name: Sewers of Estark
Text: Choose target creature. If it's attacking, it can't be blocked this turn. If it's blocking, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this combat by it and each creature it's blocking.

Name: Giant Badger
Text: Whenever Giant Badger blocks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
